current: Added support for official shortened youtube urls (youtu.be)
Added command to check most recent changes (/changelogs)
Added script to generate needed files not in VCS
Fixed message not being sent when a video was added to queue
Fixed issue regarding using bot in one server causing the bot to sometimes stop in another
Fixed messages being sent despite bot not being in Voice Channel
1.2.0: Added support for multiple servers using music functionality
Added ability to repeat current video
Restricted status command to bot moderators (not server mods)
